#include <stdio.h>

 

main ()

{

int x, y, t, v, w;

int e[10];

for (w=1; scanf("%d",&x),x>0; w++,puts(""))

	{

	scanf("%d",&y);

	if(x>y)

		{

		t=x;

		x=y;

		y=t;

		}

	for(t=-1; ++t<10; e[t]=0);

	for(t=x; t<=y; t++)

		for(v=t; v>0; v/=10)

			e[v%10]++;

	printf("Case %d: ",w);

	for(t=-1; ++t<10; printf("%d:%d ",t,e[t]));

	}

return 0;

}
